AT.name: Mega Man Zero
AT.description: Nach einhundertjährigem Schlaf erwacht Zero in einer seltsamen, vom Krieg zerrissenen Welt und wird in diesem ersten Spiel aus seiner eigenen Reihe von Abenteuern zum Helden. In Mega Man Zero schließt sich der kybernetische Krieger einer Widerstandsgruppe an, die gegen einen seltsam vertrauten Gegner kämpft. Diese neue Ablegerserie führt neue Spielelemente wie missionsbasierte Level ebenso ein wie Waffen, die sich verbessern, wenn du mehr Erfahrung sammelst, sowie die Cyber-Elfen: kleine, aber mächtige Kreaturen, die eine Vielzahl nützlicher Fähigkeiten verleihen.

AU.name: Mega Man Zero
AU.description: Awakened after a century of sleep, in a strange war torn world, Zero becomes the hero in the first of his own series of adventures. Mega Man Zero sees the cybernetic warrior join forces with a resistance group battling a strangely familiar foe. This new spin-off series introduced new gameplay elements like mission-based levels, and weapons that level-up as you gain more experience; and also Cyber Elves: small but powerful creatures that grant a wide range of useful abilities.

BG.name: Mega Man Zero
BG.description: Awakened after a century of sleep, in a strange war torn world, Zero becomes the hero in the first of his own series of adventures. BE.name: Mega Man Zero
BE.description: Réveillé après un siècle de sommeil dans un monde anéanti par la guerre, Zero est le héro de la première aventure de sa série. Dans Mega Man Zero, le guerrier cybernétique a uni ses forces avec un groupe de résistants pour lutter contre un ennemi étrangement familier. Cette nouvelle série offre des nouveaux éléments de gameplay tels que les niveaux à mission et des armes qui s'améliorent au fur et à mesure que vous gagnez de l'expérience. Découvrez également les Cyber Elves, des créatures plus petites mais plus puissantes, possédant de nombreuses capacités qui s'avèreront très utiles.

ES.name: Mega Man Zero
ES.description: Sacado de su letargo un siglo después en un mundo extraño destrozado por la guerra, Zero se convierte en el protagonista de la primera aventura de su saga. En este juego, que comparte nombre con su protagonista, verás al guerrero cibernético unir fuerzas con un grupo de resistencia para luchar contra un enemigo extrañamente familiar. Esta nueva saga basada en el mundo de Mega Man introduce nuevos elementos de juego como los niveles por misiones y las armas que mejoran a medida que obtienes más experiencia, sin olvidar a los elfos cibernéticos (pequeños seres con grandes poderes que otorgan una gran variedad de habilidades de lo más útiles).

IT.name: Mega Man Zero
IT.description: Risvegliato da un sonno lungo un secolo, Zero si ritrova nel mezzo di una guerra che ha devastato il mondo e si prepara a diventare l'eroe indiscusso della sua personale saga. Il nostro cibernetico guerriero si dovrà unire a un movimento di resistenza in lotta contro un nemico stranamente familiare. Questa nuova serie ispirata alle vicende di Mega Man introduce nuovi elementi di gioco, come i livelli organizzati in missioni e il potenziamento delle armi a mano a mano che ottieni esperienza. Incontrerai anche nuovi alleati che potranno aiutarti con utili abilità, come gli elfi cibernetici, creature minuscole ma dagli incredibili poteri.

NO.name: Mega Man Zero
NO.description: Awakened after a century of sleep, in a strange war torn world, Zero becomes the hero in the first of his own series of adventures. Mega Man Zero sees the cybernetic warrior join forces with a resistance group battling a strangely familiar foe. This new spin-off series introduced new gameplay elements like mission-based levels, and weapons that level-up as you gain more experience; and also Cyber Elves: small but powerful creatures that grant a wide range of useful abilities.

NL.name: Mega Man Zero
NL.description: In het eerste deel van zijn reeks avonturen ontwaakt Zero na een eeuw van slaap in een wereld geruïneerd door oorlog. In Mega Man Zero voegt de cybernetische strijder zich toe aan een groep verzetsstrijders die strijd levert met een tegenstander die Zero maar al te bekend is. Deze reeks introduceerde nieuwe gameplayelementen zoals levels met een missiestructuur, en wapens die verbeteren naarmate je meer ervaring verdient. Tevens zijn er de Cyber Elves, kleine maar machtige wezens die je voorzien van allerlei handige vaardigheden.

NZ.name: Mega Man Zero
NZ.description: Awakened after a century of sleep, in a strange war torn world, Zero becomes the hero in the first of his own series of adventures. Mega Man Zero sees the cybernetic warrior join forces with a resistance group battling a strangely familiar foe. This new spin-off series introduced new gameplay elements like mission-based levels, and weapons that level-up as you gain more experience; and also Cyber Elves: small but powerful creatures that grant a wide range of useful abilities.

PL.name: Mega Man Zero
PL.description: Awakened after a century of sleep, in a strange war torn world, Zero becomes the hero in the first of his own series of adventures. Mega Man Zero sees the cybernetic warrior join forces with a resistance group battling a strangely familiar foe. This new spin-off series introduced new gameplay elements like mission-based levels, and weapons that level-up as you gain more experience; and also Cyber Elves: small but powerful creatures that grant a wide range of useful abilities.

PT.name: Mega Man Zero
PT.description: Adormecido durante um longo século, Zero desperta num mundo estranho e destruído pela guerra e torna-se no herói da primeira da sua série de aventuras. Mega Man Zero assiste à união de forças entre o herói cibernético e um grupo de resistência para lutar contra um inimigo estranhamente familiar. Esta nova saga introduz novos elementos de jogo, como os níveis por missões e as armas que melhoram à medida que obténs mais experiência. Descobre ainda os Cyber Elves, pequenas criaturas com grandes poderes e várias habilidades diferentes que serão bastante úteis.

RU.name: Mega Man Zero
RU.description: В странном мире, охваченном войной, пробуждается от векового сна Zero. Его ждет великое приключение, и на сей раз ему предстоит стать главным героем серии Mega Man Zero. Отважный кибернетический воин объединяет усилия с группой сопротивления в борьбе со смутно знакомым врагом. В Mega Man Zero появились новые элементы игрового процесса, например уровни с определенной миссией, оружие, которое становится более мощным по мере того, как вы приобретаете опыт, а также Cyber Elves — маленькие, но могущественные существа, которые могут наделить вас множеством весьма полезных способностей.
